Business_register_text_1: At piglia temp d’emplenir il formular cun precisiun. Uschea at chatta tia vaschinada il plü bain e at pon lura contactar. La descripziun es, sper tschellas indicaziuns, fich centrala. Descriva cuort sco cha tü est pertoc da la situaziun actuala e che cha tü poust spordscher adonta da tuot. Eir illa descripziun pudessast dumandar per agüd o sco chi’s po sustgnair a tai ed a teis affar il meglder. Id es eir permiss d’agiunscher ulteriurs Links per paginas web, buttias online o eir divers 'Online-Streamings'
Business_register_text_2: Scha hast dabsögn da sustegn, scriva a nus sur
local_Description_2: tia sporta, teis nom e contact, uras d’avertüra ed accessibilità e.u.i...
local_terms: Acceptar las cundiziuns generalas da fatschenta (AGB’s)
local_intro_text_1: Are you unable to pursue your normal business because of the Corona crisis or did you even have to close it down? It’s hard but you still say positive and develop new ideas and new distribution channels! Whether with delivery services, by post, with gift cards for 'after Corona' or via online streaming - be (a) local hero and show your neighbourhood that you are still there for them – they will be there for you too! #Solidarity
local_intro_text_2_1: The coronavirus poses great challenges for our entire society. Local companies and self-employed persons are heavily affected. They have lost almost all their customers or even had to close down completely. Many lack the financial means to survive this crisis. Now it’s up to us!
local_intro_text_2_2: Show solidarity. Visit online your favourite coffee shop, your local flower store or the yoga studio around the corner - be (a) local hero and support the preservation of the local diversity in your community - of course in compliance with the instructions of the government and social distancing.
local_login_text_1: Be Local Hero has the mission to support local businesses and organisations in these difficult times! The aim is to promote solidarity and to make businesses visible to local customers – free of charge and for a good cause.
local_login_text_2: Two easy steps to make yourself visible:
local_login_text_3: 1. Create your profile with your name and email address or via Facebook (this data will not be published). With the profile you can then create as many offers as you like and edit them again.
local_login_text_4: 2. Fill out the form with all important information about you, your product/service and what you offer during the Corona crisis or how we can help you (e.g. with gift cards etc.)
local_login_text_5: 3. Hooray! You are visible on Be Local Hero and your neighbourhood will see you! And don’t forget to share the link to your offer directly in your network - be (a) local hero :)
local_login_text_6: Important: Be Local Hero is a platform to connect businesses and customers. You have to organise delivery and payment yourself. If you need support, write to us: act@belocalhero.com
about_text_1: Get in touch with us: act@belocalhero.com - we are looking forward to get your questions, inputs and feedback.
about_text_2: Be Local Hero is supported by:
page_about_us_text_2: Be Local Hero is a collaborative project from Modeso, co-co-co and CooperativeSuisse. With this platform we want to support local businesses and self-employed people to get through this difficult time. Be Local Hero is free for everyone.
